chat: Standardize university names by ensuring consistent formatting of city and state, separating them with a dash while maintaining the original order of components.

tuples.input: University of Pennsylvania Phialdelphia- PA- USA
tuples.output: University of Pennsylvania- Phialdelphia- PA- USA

tuples.input: Columbia University New York- NY- USA
tuples.output: Columbia University- New York- NY- USA

tuples.output: Cornell University- Ithaca- New York- USA

tuples.input: University of Maryland College Park College Park- MD
tuples.output: University of Maryland College Park- College Park- MD

tuples.input: Yale University New Haven- CT- USA
tuples.output: Yale University- New Haven- CT- USA
